mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments ( id, post_id, author_id, parent_id, content, status, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{comment.id}, #{comment.postId}, #{comment.authorId}, #{comment.parentId}, #{comment.content}, #{comment.status}, #{comment.createdAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment.updatedAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, post_id, author_id, parent_id, content, status, created_at, updated_at FROM comments WHERE post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
